text: Hopolang re entse selekane le bana ba Israele; se khumameleng mong kantle ho Allah, le hlomphe batsoali, le beng ka lona, le likhutsana, le bafumanehi, le buise batho ka hlonepho; le tsitlallele thapelong, le hona ho fana ka linyehelo.” empa kamor’a mona, eaba le ea koeneha tlas’a likhothaletso haese ba fokolang feela ba lona
